title: The GTM version checker - for Google Cloud, Slack and Microsoft Teams
description: This article wil show you how to integrate Google Tag Manager changes with Microsoft Teams and Slack

title: Adding A and AAA Records on Netlify
description: If you have tried adding A and AAAA records on Netlify you might have stumbled on to some problems. I had to add some A and AAAA records to my netlify site to levrage the serverside taging in google analytics. And i encountered this error message: dns_api knapstad.dev - collect.knapstad.dev/A: 400 - link exists, all config must be empty
